statements.comment: This must deliver all given parameters as strings in an array

test.name: checkCollectionBean
test.description: gets the bean {arrayParameter=[123, 123, true, null]} and counts all entries in all lists

result.description: gets the bean {arrayParameter=[123, 123, true, null]} and counts all entries in all lists

statements.comment: This must autoconvert the parameters to integers

test.name: checkCollectionBean
test.description: gets the bean {parameterizedListParameter=[1, 2]} and counts all entries in all lists

result.description: gets the bean {parameterizedListParameter=[1, 2]} and counts all entries in all lists

statements.comment: These should autoconvert to the default types

test.name: checkCollectionBean
test.description: gets the bean {plainCollectionParameter=[1, 2, 1.30]} and counts all entries in all lists

result.description: gets the bean {plainCollectionParameter=[1, 2, 1.30]} and counts all entries in all lists

test.name: checkCollectionBean
test.description: gets the bean {plainListParameter=[1, 2, 3, 4]} and counts all entries in all lists

result.description: gets the bean {plainListParameter=[1, 2, 3, 4]} and counts all entries in all lists

test.name: checkCollectionBean
test.description: gets the bean {lowerBoundParameterizedListParameter=[1, 2, 3, 4]} and counts all entries in all lists

result.description: gets the bean {lowerBoundParameterizedListParameter=[1, 2, 3, 4]} and counts all entries in all lists

test.name: checkCollectionBean
test.description: gets the bean {setParameterWithInnerBean=[{innerParameter=1.99}, {innerParameter=2.99}]} and counts all entries in all lists

result.description: gets the bean {setParameterWithInnerBean=[{innerParameter=1.99}, {innerParameter=2.99}]} and counts all entries in all lists
